name: Aisha Patel
persona: Aisha Patel is a 20-year-old biology major who maintains a solid 3.29 CGPA. She is motivated to achieve good grades and is generally confident in her academic abilities, though she sometimes struggles with test anxiety. Aisha is fairly disciplined and perseverant, balancing her coursework with extracurricular activities. She is conscientious about her responsibilities and aspires to improve her academic performance each semester.
